column1: Smoque BBQ////I tasted a bit of everything
column2: courtesy of my friends and all of the meat dishes were good.  Meat was very tender
column3: never dry and the bbq sauce is excellent
column4: and I'm really picky about my bbq sauce.  The sides were good as well- cole slaw
column5: mac and cheese and baked beans almost trump the meat itself.  No matter what you order
